Where to stay

Where to Stay

We have a couple room blocks for anyone traveling from out of town.

Please note - rooms are only available through our room block for the following nights:
Friday, July 11
Saturday, July 12
Sunday, July 13

The reservation links below will only allow you to book rooms for the above nights. If you'd like to stay for any nights other than the ones listed, please call the hotel directly and reference the Hurt-Doss wedding.

Lodge Geneva National
$439/night

W4240 State Highway 50. Lake Geneva, WI 53147
262-245-7000

The most convenient hotel, and where Angela and Mark will be staying!

Reserve Call

The Cove of Lake Geneva
$379 - $599/night

111 Center St, Lake Geneva, WI 53147
262-249-9460

Has multi-bedroom suites available! The block includes the Anchor Studio Suite, Belle Loft Suite, and Admiral Suite

Reserve Call

The Geneva Inn

The Geneva Inn is a little farther away from the wedding venues than the other options, but.. XXX
